Package javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.temple

Class Temple

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.Actor
      • javelin.model.world.location.Location
        • javelin.model.world.location.fortification.Fortification
          • javelin.model.world.location.unique.UniqueLocation
            • javelin.model.world.location.dungeon.temple.Temple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AirTemple, EarthTemple, EvilTemple, FireTemple, GoodTemple, MagicTemple, WaterTemple
    public abstract class Temple
extends UniqueLocation
    Temples are the key to winning Javelin's Campaign mode. Each temple is locked and needs to be unlocked by a TempleKey, brute Monster.strength or DisableDevice. Inside the Temple there will be a Relic, and once all of those are collected the player can make the Win wish to finish the game. Each temple is a multi-level TempleDungeon, where on each floor can be found a special Chest. The Relic sits on the deepest floor.
    See Also:
    Win, TempleEncounter, TempleDungeon.createspecialchest(Point), Serialized Form
